fr.sorbonne_u.components.reflection.ports

Class IntercessionOutboundPort

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractPort
            • fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.AbstractOutboundPort
              • fr.sorbonne_u.components.reflection.ports.IntercessionOutboundPort
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentServiceI, OfferedI, RequiredI, OutboundPortI, PortI, IntercessionI, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class IntercessionOutboundPort
extends AbstractOutboundPort
implements IntercessionI
    The class IntercessionOutboundPort defines the outbound port associated the interface IntercessionI.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : 2018-02-16

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • execute

        public void execute()
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: IntercessionI
        execute a task on the component after all components have been started; this method is automatically called by the component virtual machine after all components have been started and the component calls in turn its own inner components. Implementations of this method can keep the control as long as they wish (contrary to start) but they need to begin by a call to super if inner components also have an execute method to be called; it is the responsibility of programmers to make sure that this does not provoke deadlocks.

        Contract

         pre    this.isStarted()
 post   true                    // no postcondition.
        Specified by:
        execute in interface IntercessionI
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - todo.
        See Also:
        IntercessionI.execute()
